name: Compensation & Salary Management
description: Compensation and salary management with pay rate tracking and history

prd.problem: Tracking worker compensation, salary changes, raises, and pay history is typically managed in separate systems or spreadsheets, making it difficult to maintain accurate records, plan budgets, and ensure pay equity.
prd.solution: Create a compensation management module that tracks current pay rates (hourly or salary), maintains complete salary history with effective dates and reasons for changes, supports pay grade structures, and provides reporting for budget planning and compliance.
successCriteria: Current compensation clearly displayed per worker
Complete salary history with effective dates
Support for both hourly and salaried workers
Raise and bonus tracking with approval workflow
assumptions: Payroll is processed in external system
Pay grade structure exists or can be defined
Authorization workflow for raises is documented
risks: Highly sensitive data requires strict access controls
Audit trail must be immutable for compliance
Integration with payroll system may be complex
